Considering its worth to you is $80, this offer provides an excellent opportunity to maximize your savings while enjoying the benefits of our product. I believe you won't find a better deal elsewhere. Don't hesitate to make this investment in yourself. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
